difficultylock-fabric.duskconfig.title: Difficulty Lock Config
difficultylock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_fo: Priority 1: Sets the difficulty in any world to peaceful when enabled.
Priority 2: Sets the difficulty in any world to easy when enabled.
Priority 3: Sets the difficulty in any world to normal when enabled.
Priority 4: Sets the difficulty in any world to hard when enabled.
difficultylock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_sh: When enabled, locks the difficulty in any world so it cannot be changed.
When enabled, also sets the difficulty in worlds where it has already been locked.
difficultylock-fabric.duskconfig.shouldC: Should Change Difficulty When Already Locked
